definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1

sentences.english: An island of the west-central Philippines south of Luzon. It was first visited by Spaniards in1570.
sentences.chinese: 民都洛岛菲律宾中西部一岛屿，位于吕宋岛以南。

sentences.english: Jiaozhou Bay, which is much smaller, is found to the south, next to Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 而半岛以南紧挨青岛的胶州湾，则要小得多。

sentences.english: His name was Mr Frankland, and he lived about four miles to the south of the Hall.
sentences.chinese: 他是福兰克兰先生，住在庄园以南约四英里远的地方。

sentences.english: Of Naphtali; Ahira the son of Enan.
sentences.chinese: 属拿弗他利的，有以南的儿子亚希拉。

sentences.english: A city of northeast France south of Colmar.
sentences.chinese: 法国东北部城市，位于科尔马以南。

sentences.english: The history of oil in sub-Saharan Africa does not make for happy reading.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲的石油历史读来并不让人愉快。

sentences.english: At minimum, that would unsettle Japan to the north and the Philippines to the south.
sentences.chinese: 起码，这可以令以北的日本和以南的菲律宾如坐针毡。

sentences.english: The need for aid is especially acute in Sub-Saharan Africa.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲对援助的需要尤为急迫。

sentences.english: This was shot in Tecopa Hot Springs south of Death Valley, CA.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片拍摄于加州死亡谷以南的特科帕温泉。

sentences.english: This is especially true in sub-Saharan Africa, which falls behind on all of the goals.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠以南的非洲地区落后于所有的目标。

sentences.english: A city of central Iran south of Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯帕罕伊朗中部一城市，在续墨兰以南。

sentences.english: Soft rock area distribute extensive at south area of Mountain Qin. Which Xikang railway go through.
sentences.chinese: 西康铁路沿线软质岩带在秦岭以南分布较广。

sentences.english: Dengue is present in sub-Saharan Africa but often unrecognized.
sentences.chinese: 登革热存在于撒哈拉以南非洲，但往往识别不到。

sentences.english: Human Rights Watch accused government troops of placing mines last month south of Ajdabiya.
sentences.chinese: 观察指责政府军上个月在阿季达比耶以南埋置地雷。

sentences.english: Tanggula Mountains to the south of the Brahmaputra is famous.
sentences.chinese: 唐古拉山以南，就是赫赫有名的雅鲁藏布江。

sentences.english: Sub-Saharan Africa is only slowly democratizing.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲的民主化进程缓慢。
